Is it in the correct section of your commands class normally theres a method for, mods, admins, and owners and if it’s under owners or admins and your that right it should work if not then you should try to rank yourself up and re try the command. Otherwise the command could be flawed.

item.title: Base is PI
item.dc:creator: @ladaswa ladaswa
item.description:
@ladaswa wrote:

This is my item command. It won’t let me spawn items? I’ve NEVER had problems with commands on PI before. What the heck?
if (playerCommand.startsWith(“item”)) {
try {
String[] args = playerCommand.split(" ");
if (args.length == 3) {
int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(args[1]);
int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(args[2]);
if ((newItemID <= 20500) && (newItemID >= 0)) {
c.getItems().addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);
} else {
c.sendMessage(“That item ID does not exist.”);
}
} else {
c.sendMessage(“Wrong usage: (Ex:(::pickup_ID_Amount)(::item 995 1))”);
}
} catch(Exception e) {

			} 
			}

Read full topic
